name: Pura Segara
excerpt: Hindu temple close to the beach, in the centre of town.
detail_description: Hindu temple close to the beach, in the centre of town.

name: Pura Dalem
excerpt: One of Padangbai's major temples, in the centre of town.
detail_description: One of Padangbai's major temples, in the centre of town.

name: Masjid Padang Bai
excerpt: Small mosque located at the west end of Padangbai, near the post office.
detail_description: Small mosque located at the west end of Padangbai, near the post office.

name: Bias Tugal
excerpt: Walk southwest from the ferry terminal and follow the trail up the hill for about 1.3km to Bias Tugal, also known as Pantai Kecil (Little Beach), on the…
detail_description: Walk southwest from the ferry terminal and follow the trail up the hill for about 1.3km to Bias Tugal, also known as Pantai Kecil (Little Beach), on the exposed coast outside the bay. Be careful in the water as it is subject to strong currents. There are a couple of daytime warung here.

name: Pura Silayukti
excerpt: See the place where Empu Kuturan – who introduced the caste system to Bali in the 11th century – is said to have lived by following a path up to this…
detail_description: See the place where Empu Kuturan – who introduced the caste system to Bali in the 11th century – is said to have lived by following a path up to this headland at the northeast corner of Padangbai's bay. From the three temples here, you'll have good views.

name: Pura Penataran
excerpt: A small Hindu temple in the western section of Padangbai; to find it, continue walking past the mosque.
detail_description: A small Hindu temple in the western section of Padangbai; to find it, continue walking past the mosque.

name: Blue Lagoon Beach
excerpt: On the far side of Padangbai's eastern headland, about a 500m walk from the town centre, is this small sandy beach. It has a couple of warungs and gentle,…
detail_description: On the far side of Padangbai's eastern headland, about a 500m walk from the town centre, is this small sandy beach. It has a couple of warungs and gentle, family-friendly surf.
